original_text: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.
korean_text: 소멸하여 가는 달팽이 같게 하시며 만삭 되지 못하여 출생한 아이가 햇빛을 보지 못함 같게 하소서

sentences.original_text: let every one of them pass away
like the untimely birth of a woman
that they may not see the sun
